name: 5-beard_short_boxed: Black
description: You have a black moustache and a short beard with trimmed sides.  Thin patches connect them both, forming a 'box' around the lips, thus the name.

name: 5-beard_goatee: Black
description: You have a short black beard at the tip of your chin.

name: 5-beard_full: Black
description: You have a black moustache and a long beard, both formed by allowing free growth of hair, with no particular styling.

name: 5-beard_chevron: Black
description: You have a black moustache that covers your entire top lip.

name: 5-beard_neckbeard: Black
description: You have a black beard formed from hair grown on neck below the chin line.  No moustache included.

name: 5-beard_moustache: Black
description: You have a black moustache with shortened ends, that covers only the skin above your upper lip.

name: 5-beard_royale: Black
description: You have a black moustache and a short beard forming a patch under your lips.

name: 5-beard_soul_patch: Black
description: You have a little bit of black hair in the dip under your lower lip, and no other facial hair whatsoever.

name: 5-beard_chin_strap: Black
description: You have a black beard along the jaw lines, circling tha chin, and no moustache.

name: 5-beard_circle: Black
description: You have a black moustache and a short beard, that both form a circle around your lips.
